boroughs = nyc_airbnb %>% distinct(borough) %>% pull()

selectInput(
  inputId = 'borough_choice',
  label = h3('Borough Choice'),
  choices = boroughs,
  selected = 'Manhattan'
)

sliderInput(
  inputId = 'price_range',
  label = h3('Price Range'),
  min = 50, max = 1000, value = c(100, 250)
)

room_types = nyc_airbnb %>% distinct(room_type) %>% pull()

radioButtons(
  inputId = 'room_choice',
  label = h3('Room Type'),
  choices = room_types,
  selected = 'Entire home/apt'   ##this decides the default choice
)
